Plot: A skirmish in Shanghai puts archaeologist Indiana Jones, his partner Short Round and singer Willie Scott crossing paths with an Indian village desperate to reclaim a rock stolen by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.
Title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Writer: Willard Huyck (screenplay), Gloria Katz (screenplay), George Lucas (story)
Actors: Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Jonathan Ke Quan, Amrish Puri
tomatoConsensus: It may be too "dark" for some, but Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom remains an ingenious adventure spectacle that showcases one of Hollywood's finest filmmaking teams in vintage form.
